roles.description: Build and deploy ML models for prediction, analytics, and automation. You will work on massive scale neural networks.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Master Python & PyTorch/TensorFlow.
2. Build end-to-end ML projects.
3. Understand System Design for ML.
4. Apply via company portal.

roles.description: Automate model deployment, monitoring, and lifecycle management. Focus on CI/CD for Machine Learning pipelines.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Learn Docker & Kubernetes.
2. Master tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, or TFX.
3. Gain experience with AWS/GCP cloud infra.

roles.description: Develop internal ML platforms (Michelangelo) and tooling for model training and serving at scale.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Strong Software Engineering background (Java/Go/Python).
2. Experience building distributed systems.
3. Knowledge of Spark/Hadoop.

roles.description: Deploy large language models on cloud environments with high availability and low latency.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Deep understanding of LLM inference (vLLM, TGI).
2. CUDA optimization skills.
3. High-performance Python/C++.

roles.description: Use machine learning and statistics to deliver insights, drive product direction, and support decision making.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Strong Stats & Probability foundation.
2. SQL Mastery is mandatory.
3. Product Sense & A/B Testing intuition.

roles.description: Analyze datasets, generate visuals, dashboards, and reports for business supply chain teams.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Excel & SQL proficiency.
2. Tableau/PowerBI for visualization.
3. Strong communication skills.

roles.description: Work on analytical research, forecasting, and modeling for personalized recommendation algorithms.
roles.how_to_get:
1. PhD or Masters in Quantitative field.
2. Experience with Causal Inference.
3. Python/R expertise.

roles.description: Build next-gen models for text classification, chatbots, sentiment analysis, and summarization.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Published research in NLP conferences.
2. Deep understanding of Transformers.
3. Experience training large models.

roles.description: Optimize prompts and chains for LLM-based applications and workflows to ensure high quality outputs.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Extensive experimentation with GPT-4/Claude.
2. Understanding of chain-of-thought reasoning.
3. Basic scripting skills.

roles.description: Develop models for image recognition, object detection, and video analytics for Autopilot.
roles.how_to_get:
1. Strong C++ skills.
2. Experience with Real-time inference.
3. Knowledge of SLAM and 3D Geometry.
